channel.title: FoxscapePRO - 317 Classic
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]FoxscapePRO[/b][/size] Hosted by Fox2007 [center][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=profox.no-ip.biz][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/profox.no-ip.biz.png[/img][/url][/center] [b]Client Download[/b]: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/103983828/client.zip]Download FoxscapePRO Client[/url] [b]FoxscapePRO Forums[/b]: [url=http://foxscapepro.com/forum]http://foxscapepro.com/forum[/url]
[center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OEa-mJc7NF0[/youtube][/center] Hey everyone, im bringing back Foxscape! This server is all original 317 and [b]NOT BASED ON DELTA..FUCK DELTA[/b]. This server was coded from scratch using winterlove v3. There are a few minor glitches like heads disappearing when equipping helmets, and you wont do damage without a sword, so thats just a few upgrades we have to make.
Thanks to a nice guy, we now have our own domain! Please visit the website and register to get extra benefits in the game. It is not integrated or anything, so I do the best i can by myself.
Server Features: - Perfect Range - Near Perfect Combat (except as described above) - Teleporting sounds - Near full teleports - Magic works including animations and gfx - No cheat items - No dupes - No glitches (except as described above.) - Most Skills (Will List Below) - Shops are on Quest Interface - No lag, very stable. Anti-SYI (Most probably wont even know lol)
Working Skills: - Mining - Woodcutting - Firemaking - Smithing - Herblore - Fletching - Fishing - Crafting
Some more skills i don't know about. I'm not even sure if they all work because i haven't used this source since [b]2007[/b].
PS. If someone can help me fix the head glitch when equipping helmets hood etc. You will receive Admin on server and "PRO Supporter" status on forums.

item.title: FoxscapePRO - 317 Classic
item.dc:creator: @Fox2007 Fox2007
item.description:
@Fox2007 wrote:

[size=18pt]FoxscapePRO[/size]
Hosted by Fox2007
[center][/center]
Client Download: Download FoxscapePRO Client
FoxscapePRO Forums: http://foxscapepro.com/forum

[center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OEa-mJc7NF0[/youtube][/center]
Hey everyone, im bringing back Foxscape! This server is all original 317 and NOT BASED ON DELTA…FUCK DELTA. This server was coded from scratch using winterlove v3. There are a few minor glitches like heads disappearing when equipping helmets, and you wont do damage without a sword, so thats just a few upgrades we have to make.

Thanks to a nice guy, we now have our own domain! Please visit the website and register to get extra benefits in the game. It is not integrated or anything, so I do the best i can by myself.

Server Features:

  • Perfect Range
  • Near Perfect Combat (except as described above)
  • Teleporting sounds
  • Near full teleports
  • Magic works including animations and gfx
  • No cheat items
  • No dupes
  • No glitches (except as described above.)
  • Most Skills (Will List Below)
  • Shops are on Quest Interface
  • No lag, very stable. Anti-SYI (Most probably wont even know lol)

Working Skills:

  • Mining
  • Woodcutting
  • Firemaking
  • Smithing
  • Herblore
  • Fletching
  • Fishing
  • Crafting

Some more skills i don’t know about. I’m not even sure if they all work because i haven’t used this source since 2007.

PS. If someone can help me fix the head glitch when equipping helmets hood etc. You will receive Admin on server and “PRO Supporter” status on forums.
